website_summaries.verdict: The Apple MacBook Air 11-inch (Mid 2013) is the Haswell updated version of the iconic ultraportable laptop. It lasts over 10 hours running on battery power, so it's a highly recommended choice if you must have the thinnest possible laptop with the most battery life.

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop ever. So light and fast. I've been using mine for 2 years and it still looks and works like brand new. Battery still lasts over 10 hours. I multitask like crazy including multiple browsers and video/photo editing, this handles it with no problems ever. Extensive traveling the whole time and not a scratch. I'll be upgrading to the newest version from Apple with 8gb ram and the core i7 purely for video editing reasons, otherwise this laptop would easily last another 2 years as is. Fan only comes on after editing video for a while otherwise it's completely silent. I would give this laptop 6 stars if I could because it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is amazing.. I heard upgrading to the new os ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is amazing.. I heard upgrading to the new os hurt battery life so I'm sticking with mavericks for now. Standby will last for days and days usage will last one day he with heavy use 2days with moderate use and 3 with light use all at about 50% screen brightness and back-lit keyboard off. The back-lit keyboard really takes a crap on the battery life so try to keep it off when not using it. There is a button for turning back-lit keyboard on and off do this shouldn't be an issue. You can also adjust the settings in mavericks to only turn on the back-lit keyboard when typing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 9th grader to use at home for assignments and his iMovie projects. The laptop definitely exceeded expectations. If I didn't know it was refurbished I would think it was new. We are both more than satisfied with the computer and would buy refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms EmH

customer_reviews.title: Small, and packs a punch, but boy is it small
customer_reviews.text: Great product and just as nice as the 13", however, it is much smaller than I thought the two inches could be. The reviews made it seem like just loosing out on a little screen and the keyboard and the rest about the same. If you want tiny and functional, this is the one, however, if you would like decent sized and usable, but still small, go 13"
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Macbook Air just keep getting better!
customer_reviews.text: Another perfect laptop in the Macbook Air line. It's my 4th Mac laptop and best yet. The illuminated keyboard wasn't on my 2009 Air and man, did I miss not having it. Other speed and port enhancements make the Air the finest laptop computer going, be it for home, work, travel or school. With DVD and CD's on the way out there seems no call to lug the added bulk an optical drive adds. Note: I bought a Square Trade Warrantee this time around instead of Applecare; hopefully I won't need it, but Applecare is overpriced in my view. It's been helpful for my Mac Pro's, but for a portable product, the Square Trade deal covers possible disasters Applecare omits.
customer_reviews.author: Fogbound Phantom

customer_reviews.title: The laptop it self was in great condition and has been working fine ever since I ...
customer_reviews.text: The only way I could tell my laptop was refurbished and not new was that the charging cable had some wear and tear. The laptop it self was in great condition and has been working fine ever since I got it a few months back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb mini-computer
customer_reviews.text: The packing slip says "newest version", not "older version". I had it configured to also run Windows 8.1 and it will do anything my very powerful custom built desktop PC does, and faster. I love the instant boot up. Its keyboard is outstanding. And it takes up little more space and weight than my iPad2; it will be my standard traveling companion in my carry on under the seat bag. It seems to be quite rugged, too. I will only miss the touch screen tap and gesture features of the iPad a little bit, although I must admit I had become pretty adept at using the virtual keyboard, not even needing the Touchfire overlay any more.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful laptop for a used one!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful laptop! This was a gift for my grandson and he just loves it. He is very happy with it and has nothing but good things to say about it. It did arrived in great shape and on the date that it was promised for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: rpcruz

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed. This company should show a photo of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer had over 9 dents in it -I bought it for my 13 year old daughter but it was SO banged up I returned it immediately without even turning it on. VERY disappointed. This company should show a photo of the ACTUAL machine and describe defects in detail.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: pint sized powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This computer is small and light, essential for a road warrior like me. It slips into my bag or pack like an extra file rather than a laptop. It is fully functional and nicely handles all my "heavy" apps, such as those I use from the Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, etc. The resolution on the small screen is very good and during most work sessions feels as spacious as my 13" mac pro. The battery life is terrific; that was a major selling point for me. Amazon price and delivery were excellent. This is the first time I've purchased an Apple computer through Amazon but I will certainly consider doing so again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could want in a computer. Great battery life, great keyboard, easy to use - it's nearly flawless. I think my single complaint is the bulk of the charger and the fact that the battery lasts so long that I tend to misplace the charger because it's needed so infrequently. This was also my first Mac - a big switch for a long time PC user. Not sure I'll ever go back to slow loads and bulky computers that are slammed together with inconsistent manufacturing standards. This is a work of art that is also a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Trotti

customer_reviews.title: It's Everything.
customer_reviews.text: Well after looking into some new replacement computers... this seemed to be the ideal one for me. MacBook Air is everything it claims to be; portable, light, fast (really fast; loading, wifi, shutdown and startup) and best of all with the Solid-State drive it is quiet as can be and never gets hot. What really sold me was the battery life and overall price for the product. As a prime member i got free 2 day shipping and received it in 25 hours of ordering. EDIT: JUNE 4, 2017; Still an amazing computer, I have NEVER had an issue with it... I'm almost afraid to upgrade eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Jbro

customer_reviews.title: It's A Mac!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Macs since the original in 1984. This MacBook Air is a beautiful piece of Industrial Design and Engineering; it is a piece of art. If you hold the MacBook Pro in one hand and the MacBook Air in the other, the MacBook Pro feels like brick! And if you have ever used a Mac you are aware of all of the advantages of OS X and the beautiful Apple monitors. The MacBook Air is an engineering masterpiece! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: navydoc

customer_reviews.title: Nearly my favorite device ever!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is the second favorite gadget I've ever owned behind my first iPod Touch. There's just a novelty and a fondness to everything that I could do with that little iPod that I'll not soon forget. With that, this little laptop is more capable than any other computer that I have ever owned. It only weighs about a half a pound more than an iPad 2 and gets 2 more hours on a charge (12 hours) thanks to the Haswell processor that was introduced with the mid-2013 update. This is also my very first Mac and it couldn't be a better choice. I can't say enough about this machine!
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, Apple. Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not typically a fan of Apple and their overpriced products, but I decided to purchase this to get familiar with the OSx and see why so many people hate it or love it. It's not bad for the price depending on what you use it for. I have a PC tower I built myself, an Alienware m17x, and now this. The Macbook Air is great for portable web surfing, document editing, etc. which is why I understand why a lot of college students own them. However, I dislike the fact that the operating system is so simple it pretty much thinks for you. Nonetheless, good little computer for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Gem
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished Gem. I was very pleased with the refurbished MacBook Air 13" model I purchased. One slight ding and everything else as good as new including the original charger. It was delivered in a plain box which was a plus since it was left at the door. I would certainly purchase again from the NY Electronics Store!
customer_reviews.author: Ixthyz

customer_reviews.title: Power and finesse all in one, with energy to spare.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my MBA. Boots in seconds, although I never turn it off. Apps like Photoshop or Excel that used to bounce in the dock forever on my previous Mac open with barely one bounce. Battery life is amazing, I never have to take my charger with me for a full day on the road. My older MacBook Pro feels as heavy as Thor's hammer compared to this svelte beauty.
customer_reviews.author: modulated

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this laptop! The overall layout is great, the screen has such a clear picture. I love how light the laptop is, and it is great for writing papers. I really like the keyboard. The speed is fairly quick, and I seem to be getting less ads on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I chose the MBA because I wanted an efficient computer that was portable and had good battery life. The MBA fulfills these requirements in full. The transition to OSX was not overly complicated and the few questions I had were easily resolved by google although I consider myself computer proficient. One thing that should be noted is the compatibility between MS Office and Apples productivity suite. It leaves something to be desired, if transitioning from MS Office the purchase of Office for Mac seems a necessity to me. Another thing to note when purchasing and considering price is the number of thunderbolt adapters and/or a superdrive that you may need to purchase. Overall I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evan B.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite a mac... yet - was a PC
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm not quite a mac, yet - but I'm loving everything about this MacBook Air. It is taking me a while to get used to everything being reverse compared to my Sony vaio. I am forever scrolling in the wrong direction. There are still some simple tasks that I'm trying to figure out and I'm doing research on the best apps, so hopefully I'll "be a mac" soon. Things I adore compared to my other notebook: starts up and shuts down SUPER FAST. Is very lightweight! Syncing everything up with my iPhone and iPad. The battery life is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Vyse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, elegant, functional and light - battery life outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I have been gyrating back and forth between Mac and PC for years. We're of course stuck with PCs at work... But this Macbook Air is simply the most elegant, beautiful, functional product ever. It comes with most all the software you could ever need, interfaces seamlessly with my iPhone, and is just awesome. Life on earth is too short to not have a Macbook. Yosemite seems to add to the battery life!
customer_reviews.author: jcalaw63

customer_reviews.title: Macbook Air a winner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer, and just as advertised. I also got a pre-owned one which I have used for over a year now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: First Time Laptop Buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very fast compared to my adware clogged, bloatware ridden, virus targeted PC! Although I'm still trying to figure out how to use it effectively. My old favorite Apple product was my IPAD (first generation) which Apple no longer supports. I'm hoping this laptop doesn't share the same fate!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Costello

customer_reviews.title: A Hoss
customer_reviews.text: Incredible computer. Incredible capabilities. I've never had any problems with this computer and I bought it used a year ago. The battery life is unreal. I will be on it daily probably 2-3 hours a day and I try to charge it once a week and let the battery get down to about 15-20%. Battery life was the big thing for me so I am very impressed by Apple on this point. In terms of performance, the internet at my apartment is miserable so I wasn't expecting any changes there. I will say that my computer is always faster than my wife's MBP. always. And that in itself may have been worth the computer! Kidding.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this laptop since Day 1, Its been 2 months now and I don't regret it!!! Haven't needed to call tech support or nothing. Pros: Wifi 802.11ac(fast!) High Res screen beautiful design AMAZING backlit keyboard Best Trackpad Ive ever used VERY USER FRIENDLY (Set up my printer in like 5 sec. and a wireless mouse in 2) Battery life is spectacular Cons: Hmmmm, missing retina display but that doesn't bother me AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Pena

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but after owning this laptop for a bit over 6 months I felt compelled to give it the glowing review it deserves. This is simply a fantastic machine. Pros: Speed! With the SSD, everything is so snappy and waking up the laptop is virtually instantaneous. Trackpad is second to none. Make sure to configure custom gestures for common tasks. Battery life is absurdly long under normal use conditions. After 6 months I'm still getting 8+ hours per charge. Great looking screen with high brightness. Lightweight while still feeling really solid & sturdy. OS X is a pro for me. Cons: Bigger SSD is unjustifiably pricey. Speakers are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Mac for the ages?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Macs since 1985, the first one out. My new MacAir is amazing and maybe I can use 10% of its capacity. One CAVEAT and that is that non iOS devices are being programmed (often) in favor of iOS devices. Apple has to slow down a bit and get the billion plus details involved all lined up for seamless iCloud performance. It IS NOT seamless yet and the iOS devices have stolen some of the desktop user friendly fine points of the recent past, before the iOS frenzy engulfing us all.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for Apple and the Apple support team
customer_reviews.text: I still question myself as to the reason I waited so long to buy an Apple and think I was looking at the financial aspect. An Apple costs more because it is worth more. I like that I get to choose what I want to add as software, that downloads are safe because they come from Apple. I appreciate so much the guys who were so patient to explain over the phone how to maneuver. I am still tremendously pleased and plan to use it for a long time to write.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Day

customer_reviews.title: It's all been said  before... but it's worth repeating
customer_reviews.text: Boots in 4 seconds, wakes from sleeping in 1/2 second, giving 9 hours of charge with light usage; 6-7 hours with medium; 4.5 with heavy (had drive attached, lots of wifi, high brightness) - that's pretty amazing. To all those people who complain that the machine is slow when gaming, or the little arrow buttons are too small, or they got three defective machines in a row so they cannot abide by the Macbook product - go out and enjoy life more. When the retina screen version arrives, I'll be right back here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Brody

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: 4GB of memory for such machine was a shame. Apple should discontinue it! During normal use (iTunes music in the background and Internet surfing) the computer became unresponsive and required restart (ran out of memory!) For over $1000 laptop, buyer expects more! If you're looking for iMac air, 8GB of RAM is not an option, it's a requirement if you want seamless operations of your machine.
customer_reviews.author: pz

customer_reviews.title: battery life
customer_reviews.text: the mac is good and working but my battery life is showing condition: "replace soon" and thats how i got the mac book and i need a response concerning it because the battery life is weak and almost damaged and its showing i need to replace soon but every other thing is working well but i need a response for the battery life that runs so fast and saying i need to replace the battery. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome condition and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this computer for its light weight, speed, and long battery life. She uses it for school and watching Netflix. We could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Bond

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The black plastic between the base and the monitor developed a crack and eventually broke along the way around. I don't recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, arrived in the condition listed. Also, conveniently for me there's about a 170 days or so left on the warranty if I need it. Mac OS X Mavericks, in general, is speedy and pretty clean in operation. I personally am coming to Mavericks from Snow Leopard so there's still a few things to which I need to adjust. I got the MacBook Air to develop iOS apps since my 2006 MacBook Pro cannot upgrade to a version of OSX that runs a version of XCode that I would need in order to make that happen.
customer_reviews.author: Alsonel S. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Problem with trackpad after few months..will stay away from Refurbished electronics
customer_reviews.author: nm654321

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great. It is super fast, instant on. I leave it in sleep mode most of the time, I rarely ever shut it off. It used for our home computer on our lower level. I charge it about once a week. The battery life is second to none. It's even better with Mavericks. I couldn't imagine owning a different laptop after this.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Be careful about the esthetic of the final product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed about the esthetic of the product. It has too many scratches over the top and sides of the mac and bent corner which it seems that it has been thrown from a car. Even though, it still working. At least, i would said nothing about the mac if there were a special discount beause of the esthetic. But, it finally costs like a good-looking used macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Flor Escuadra

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasts 3.5 hours when fully charge, one of the usb ports does not work, I'm unable to update the macOS "because the computer is missing a firmware partition" and this makes it imposible for me to install any other apps since they require a the new macOS, bluetooth does not work properly, and there are some white marks on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Poelman

customer_reviews.title: 2nd MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook Air replaced our older model that performed flawlessly. We did not need a new laptop, but the Amazon trade in program gave me $550 for my 2 1/2 year old Air, so it was well worth upgrading. As for the newest 13in Air model, I can definitely tell a difference in the speed and battery life. The size, quality, & price point make this a great buy for anyone looking for a smaller laptop and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: extraordinary device
customer_reviews.text: this is the most extraordinary device I ever had before. The battery is a plus. For a heavy user that I am, It used to last all day long. Also speakers are very good for a small machine. I used to connect it to a 32" LCD hd samsung however the crisp crystal is good enough to work without it. Since I came from a Macbook pro 17" this device is a lightweight but still with a strong built. I don't know if 250 GB will be enough but I have apple match for music, 120GB from a google cloud drive and 2TB time capsule to assure enough space available in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. AVELLANEDA

customer_reviews.title: an apple convert
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated getting this product from Amazon instead of going to an Apple store, turns out, everything is pretty intuitive and if you don't know, you can always go on line and get the right answer, I am a convert to Apple, no more Mr. Monkey Boy Ballmer products for me! Sorry Mr. Nadella, but after trying Apple, your predecessor killed any goodwill I had for MS.
customer_reviews.author: kitzler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was "lugging" around a Mac book pro. Had a bike accident and while the Mac book pro still works fine, it does not quite close all the way. I used this as an excuse to get her the airbook and she LOVES it. She travels alot so the 3 pound weight vs. the 6.5 pounds she was carrying is "heaven". Same great apple quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Girl

customer_reviews.title: If you have the money, go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. It's a Macbook Air, what do I need to tell? If you have the money, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's everything I thought it would be and I love it. Came quickly and works great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it'd have a camera but it doesn't seem to? Will have to take it to the apple store to find out what's up. Otherwise it's everything I thought it would be and I love it. Came quickly and works great. It's actually in better shape than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best computer I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Two years in with this computer. It has been dropped, left in the sun, left in a car overnight in freezing weather, abused, and still holds a charge for about 9 hours. And boots up faster than my friends new PC And works faster. Just buy an external for your backups
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have had for over 6 months. Matter I am using right now
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: good but will malfunction quickly
customer_reviews.text: good but will malfunction quickly. And as always with apple products, will need servicing right when the warranty runs out! how convenient for them.. its like their products have timers in them
customer_reviews.author: Sir Racha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever Mac. The transition/learning curve was smooth. I am so pleased with the battery life, screen quality, speed, keyboard is great for typing. Runs extremely quiet. Just a tip for those transitioning from Outlook to Mac Mail - use an app called Mail Monkey. Piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, looked as new. It is fast and capable to handle many applications. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: DEJAVUPROD

customer_reviews.title: smooth, sleek, and functionally fast.
customer_reviews.text: i prefer my laptops to be mac's and desktops to be windows. im, but no means a fanboy, but i love the MBA. it's replacing my 2009 MBP which is now slightly long in the tooth with performance for today's streaming media demands, as well as even everyday internet usage. no hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: My wife Loves it. I have to admit that I am a little jealous, and would almost trade my nice MCP retina 15'' for it but she wouldn't ... thin, light, fast, .... I have to say now that the "new" 13" MBP-r are out I would but them instead but I don't mind this .... for a great travel / coffee shop machine it is one of the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Reach_Medic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 13 year old and she loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wcool777

customer_reviews.title: My first Mac
customer_reviews.text: Allot more than I could afford, but Amazon/GE 12 month free financing plan made it work. Years of windows computers I thought would make for and awkward transition. WRONG. Mac's are really easy to use and their support people are the best ever. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Garzelloni

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get sold
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to say that thousands have said before. Its my kid, and ill sell everything i own first before this goes. Bye xbox, bye Mustang, I have bought windows all my life and have wasted money on them. Ill never buy windows again. It won't get sold, it will be given in the family years from now when mac gets even better.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop ever. I know it's expensive but it worth every dollar. Apple just know how to do it. The discount and free shipping from Amazon just made the decision easier and I bought it online. Got is in the mail in couple of days and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best lightweight computer out there. I am an IT consultant and update my work laptops frequently, and while I try to stick with Windows-based laptops (since my clients mostly use Windows), there is nothing I've found that compares to this, certainly not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CM Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I gave this computer as a gift to my wife. She loves it! It is really light and has a fast processor. I have been an IBM PC user for a long time so to get used to the different configuration of the IOS it is a little difficult in the beginning. As we are Iphone and Ipad users it made a little easier. In general a great computer, well designed and it is great looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jeferson

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily usage, but also for Djing!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is just incredible! I bought it to work with some of my personal projects, being one of them djing. I am able to use this laptop with my jig connected through USB for hours. Yesterday I was able to play during 4 hours and still had 3 hours left. I was using a Numark mixer with Traktor consuming some of the battery. Besides that the boot-up is extremely quick due to the ssd as well as the usage of several different software. My advice is to buy the 256 hard drive version. It won't create any problem to you! Beware of the RAM memory usage, though!
customer_reviews.author: Erico

customer_reviews.title: Compliments form a Windows fan
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time PC user who also does Windows development, so I can't switch to Mac personally. But, I bought this MacBook for my daughter, who is going into 10th grade. This means, of course, that I get to play with it every now-and-then. I have to say that it's pretty awesome. If you don't need to be on Windows and don't mind spending the extra bucks, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Kitzmiller

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the MacBook Air. My Dell Laptop stopped working after 5 years and I purchased the MacBook Air to tie in with my iPhone and iPad. It is fast, great screen, light weight and the battery last a long time. I purchased through Amazon but my local Apple Store help me with the setup. My purchase was in December 12/2014 and it has worked as advertised so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mrdwe

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I have always had a PC but this time decided to go with Apple. I am so glad I did. The learning curve is rather painless and when I did need to call Apple for support, they were fantastic. All in all, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lani O. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife - she didn't like being tied to our iMac. Impressive battery life, faster than the iMac (you have to love solid state drives). Screen is gorgeous. If your a mac person - you'll be used to the high build quality - if you're coming from windows it will delight you for months.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Farley

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected to be
customer_reviews.text: I'm am extremely impresssed. This computer is just what I needed for college. It's light weight. Fits in my backpack. Enough storage for the current classes I'm taking. 1 dent in the right corner like it said in the description. Other than that the computer is in perfect condition and it is just what is expected. Comes with the charger. I will definitely recommend to a friend and/or buy again. It also came packaged nicely and I ordered on a Friday and it came the following Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Lyn Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Once you go Mac you won't ever go back
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a computer that is less prone to crashing and viruses. Ditch the PC and never look back. Great battery life and extremely light weight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: It is so light and portable that I have pretty much stopped using my iPad all together except for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second macbook purchase, and it replaced a very aged core 2 duo macbook pro. It is so light and portable that I have pretty much stopped using my iPad all together except for ebook reading. I was a little skeptical about using it as a desktop/laptop replacement for work, but it seems to take care of all of my work needs just fine. Part of me kind of wishes that I had gotten the 13" for the slightly bigger screen, but the 11.6" works out nicely anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Messick

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS AFTER 1 MONTH
customer_reviews.text: At first I was super super happy with my laptop because it worked fine and the battery life was good, but then after only one month of using it: it completely shut off for good and wouldn’t turn back on. Now I have to pay an extra 300$ to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: natalie escher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Device
customer_reviews.text: After receiving it the set up went well, updates loaded and had to purchase the Microsoft Suite. That had to be digitally uploaded as there is not CD on the airbook. That was a strange part but the upload from Amazon was flawless. The airbook use of screen minimization so you can move from application to application was a nice feature. Overall, we are very pleased with it. Oh, and yes, it is so light it is like holding an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D. Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With The Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going into her 5th year of college at OSU and requested that we upgrade her from the MacBook to the MacBook Air. Physically, it's a very thin computer and has more "cool" features than the predecessors. The bottom line is my daughter is really happy with the purchase and I would recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Mac does it again
customer_reviews.text: A masterpiece in terms of size and weight with all the bells and whistles that make the mac top dog. I'm an admitted Mac freak and have been since the macPlus many moons ago, while I wince at the price I revel in its simplicity and (horrible word) functionality. Once you get over the sticker shock retreat to mac Heaven.
customer_reviews.author: J. Philip Geddes

customer_reviews.title: love my mac
customer_reviews.text: first mac, I have had several windows PCs and have used windows, linux, only briefly mac. My iphone and ipad I love so I decided to try the mac. So pleased, this thing works amazing, fast boot ups and shutdowns. Beautiful desktop and icons. The keyboard and mouse are amazing, love the LEDs on the keys. Great battery life. Best laptop ever. I suggest 256 GB version
customer_reviews.author: antzcrashing

customer_reviews.title: Does everything you need in a small lightweight body
customer_reviews.text: I love this version of the MacBook Air with 11" screen. I find it more desirable than the current version which is only available in 13". I just bought 3 of these to use as company laptops because of their portability and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly me.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for the perfect ultrabook... plus my older brother is a major computer guru so he was helping me out. I used to dislike macs and honestly I never thought that I would buy one... and yet here I am. I was tired of waiting for better processors so I decided to buy a mac because of all the positive reviews that I recieved when asking about them. I absolutely love my MacBook Air. It is extremely portable (really light and fantastic battery life), sleek, and stylish. The only problem with buying a mac.... is the cost.. But in all honesty... totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: What a Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my new Mac Air 11.6. Was very concerned about the size - thought it may be too small. Turns out it's a perfect size screen. and light as a feather. I don't even miss not have a DVD/CD player with it - I just install using another computer's CD, via remote access. This is my very first Apple and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jefecece

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Laptop Computer
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Apple hardware, and had a Macbook Air for years. When the unit showed problems, I thought about repaving some components. on it. Insteas I purchased a new Macbook Air. I love improvements that have been mad to this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, but takes some time to adjust and using PCs for 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple computer and I must say I am having some difficulty learning the ins and outs after many years as a PC user. Apple has many tutorials to help the transition. The SSD is super fast and the battery life is better than any computer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Kassel

customer_reviews.title: Light as Air
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her new laptop. She's ready for college now. I was surprised at how thin and light this laptop was and always find it amazing what Apple can do with a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Slofkosky

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: love this after switching from a pc. long overdue. so easy and lightweight and the shipping for this purchase was on time. I'm using it to write this review right now and so far iv never had any problems with it. one of the best decisions iv made so far!

customer_reviews.title: Packaged securely Very nice and clean just as described We are extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: This product came a lot sooner than expected. Packaged securely Very nice and clean just as described We are extremely pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hollands

customer_reviews.title: College student loves it
customer_reviews.text: My vision-impaired grandson loves his. He's first-year college student. Easy to carry - very light-weight. Maybe most computers have it, but this one has allowed him to easily adjust print size, sound, and much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Cure

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: this was my first macbook purchase ever and i am so pleased with what i bought!!! looks brand new!! the only visible wear i can see are a few pin needle sized scratched on the bottom - nothing a cover can't fix!! runs smoothly and fast for a 2103 model. comes with charger and in original box! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Madison M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You may pay more for Apple products, but once you have experienced them compared to others, you are glad you did. Battery life is outstanding and it is light and easy to transport. Apple customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: lucky 7

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great laptop! I bought this about 6 months ago and still working great. :) The 2013 model and the 2014 model MBA is essentially the same. The only difference being a different flash drive and very negligible amount of extra clock speed. Would recommend this for work, portable photo editing, creating music. Not recommended for gaming, or running heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Xu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience so far with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing experience so far with this laptop. It came in a timely manner and has been functioning greatly so far. The only complaint is that is pretty worn in/scuffed up, but nothing that affects its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: MACBOOK AIR
customer_reviews.text: I WANTED A MAC OF MY OWN AND A COUSIN CAME TO VISIT US WITH HIS MACBOOK AIR. I FELL IN LOVE WITH IT RIGHT AWAY. WE WILL BE TRAVELING A LOT AND THE SIZE AND WEIGHT ARE PERFECT FOR EASY MOBILITY, AND PACKING. I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE, IT DOES EVERYTHING I NEED TO DO VERY QUICKLY AND EASILY AND I AM NOT TECH SAVY AT ALL. YOU LIST THIS AS THE " OLD VERSION "....WHAT IS THAT ? I THOUGHT I WAS ORDERING THE NEWEST MAC AIR.
customer_reviews.author: pat h.

customer_reviews.title: Apple still the best
customer_reviews.text: As overpriced as Apple products are, the company produces an incredible product. Moreover, it sure beats having to use a PC with Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'donovan

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: 2013 MB Air 1.3ghz i5 4gb ram 256gb SSD....Ordered through Amazon Warehouse Deals for $650. Listed as Used but appears brand new in original box with all applicable accessories and MBA neatly wrapped in original plastic. Battery count of 4. What a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing the review using my new macbook air. I totally love it. So thin and nice looking. So far I have done only very simple use and the computer seems to be fast. It is my first mac and I was worried about learning new system could be difficult, but I was wrong. It is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works like new
customer_reviews.text: It had some dents as described but it works like new. I was surprised to see that the battery life is still great as well. Apple product really do outlast all competition.
customer_reviews.author: SAL

customer_reviews.title: Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the description of the macbook air was on point. Also got the macbook with the original packaging and all the accesories. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fast, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a MacBook Air in 2008. The new model is lighter, faster, and has much longer-lasting batteries. I really like the lighted keyboard as well. And with my address book and calendar on iCloud, these loaded up on the Air as soon as I first booted it up.
customer_reviews.author: Pitchfixer

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: bought it for daughter she haven't put it down since shes obsessed with it...omg
customer_reviews.author: tab45

customer_reviews.title: A Great Computer at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer! I purchased it when it was the previous version. The Haswell processor has been a dream and the screen is color correct. The computer is light and thin without feeling flimsy. It's a great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop-- Even looked brand new
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It was packaged in its original box so it looked like brand new. My daughter thought it was brand new but actually is refurbished. The laptop itself also looked brand new with the plastic protector on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: European Newby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Firmware still on Laptop unable to log into the laptop
customer_reviews.author: ebony fullard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better condition than I thought it'd be in. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook arrived on time, and condition was exactly as described. It was perfect, except for two scratches on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and speedy.
customer_reviews.text: The air has really earned it's place at the head of apple's notebook lineup. Great speed and an amazing profile defined the ultra book form factor and have made the Air the computer to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Great price beautiful products Had some issues thought they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price beautiful products Had some issues thought they were fixed but have resurfaced after about 6 months face time cam not available or to be located in hardware log had to reset etc
customer_reviews.author: Torben J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast long life battery BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the lightest and fastest laptop I've used to date. I underestimated how long the battery life is as well. Apple really have outdone themselves with the Macbook AIr. I've put it to the test and have multitasked like a maniac, doesn't even bog down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: ZakAttack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good product, super fast delivery. I am very happy with my purchase. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: jerry ngo

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Air MD711LL/A 11.6-Inch Laptop (OLD VERSION)
product_meta.description:
TheApple 11.6 In. MacBook Air Notebook Computer is an ultra light weight notebook computer. The system is defined by its unibody aluminum enclosure. At its thickest point the computer is only 0.68 inches -- it tapers down to 0.11 In. at its thinnest.The system has 128GB of flash storage instead of old-fashioned hard drive. That gives impressive battery life -- up to 9 hours of web browsing and 30 days of standby time. The MacBook Air is housed in an aluminum unibody enclosure, which is as strong as it is light made from a solid block of aluminum, the housing is stronger than those found on laptops built via traditional means.The 16:9 display features a native resolution of 1366 x 768. It features a glossy finish and LED backlight technology for enhanced image quality and energy efficiency.Netbooks typically feature less-than-full-size keyboards, cramped trackpads, and low-powered CPUs. This computer features a standard-size backlit chiclet keyboard. It also has a large multi-touch glass trackpad, giving you full control over your computer -- without sacrificing ergonomics. The computer is powered by a dual-core 4th-gen, low-voltage Haswell 1.3GHz Intel Core i5 processor and has 4GB of onboard 1600MHz LPDDR3 RAM. Graphics are provided by integrated Intel HD Graphics 5000. The computer features all the amenities you expect on a Mac -- a FaceTime HD webcam, dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi(also compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n), Bluetooth 4.0 and built-in stereo speakers.The Mac OS X features Time Machine backup, which automatically backs up system data to an external hard drive. The Auto Save feature on the MacBook Air ensures that you wont lose data, even when you forget to save a file. The OS tracks different versions of your documents, so you can go back to a previous draft of a document with ease. AirDrop makes it easy to transmit files wirelessly between computers, even if there is no centra

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Up to 9 Hours of Battery Life, OS X Mountain Lion
1.3 GHz Dual-Core 4th-Gen Intel Core i5 Processor (Turbo Boost up to 2.6 GHz)
11-Inch LED-backlit Display; 1366x768 Resolution; Intel HD Graphics 5000.
128 GB Flash Storage, 4 GB 1600 MHz LPDDR3 Memory
